task.title: How to Multiply Numbers
task.shortdesc: The instructions for using the multiplication feature on the JPS Calculator app.

prereq.p: You must have the app installed and opened to multiply numbers.

result.p: The result of the multiplication equation is displayed.

example.p: You need to multiply 2 and 3. The equation is 3x2=6. Press 3. Then select (x). Press 2. Then select (=).
The result 6 appears on the screen.
